price: Sema: Enyi watu! Hakika mimi ni mwonyaji kwenu niliye dhaahiri.
arabic: قُلۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ
footnotes: Ewe Nabii! Waambie hao wanao kanusha, wanao kuhimiza waletewe adhabu: Sio kazi yangu mimi kukulipeni kwa vitendo vyenu. Bali hakika mimi ni mwenye kukuhadharisheni kwa hadhari iliyo wazi kwamba kuna adhabu. Na Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye wa kukuhisabuni na kukulipeni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qul yāayyuhā al-nāsu innamā anā lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
